favourite.article: O LORD JESUS 12x O LORD... LORD.
Amen, what a wonderful rhyme! what a wonderful truth!

Amen! He is our tried and true Saviour. When we open to Him by calling upon His Name, He will take away our sin, and we receive His WONDERFUL SALVATION and we'll never be the same! Even as believers, we need this daily working out of our salvation! Let us call upon Him day by day. He is the true Saviour ensuring our transformation! Thank You Lord for the supply through this wonderful hymn!
Wow! I really like this song. I love You Lord.
